reviewText: A huge waste of money, goes much too fast without much explanation on how to do the move.  It is to late to return, goes into the trash bin.
Workout that moves fast right from the start, yet full of Patrick's amazing choreography! My favorite step workout!

I love this workout and it's one I find myself going back to again and again for it's high fun factor.  The set is bright and airy and the music is fun and upbeat.  The choreography is innovative and I was able to keep up with him well.  I love the funky taps and mambos especially.  This one always puts me in a great mood.  I highly recommend it!
